name: Minimancer
description: Build your team, fight your way through the land, unlock minions and become the ultimate Minimancer!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ (64-bit ONLY) Processor: 2GHz Dual-Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
